name: Nginx Web Server
check_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl is-active nginx || echo skip; elif command -v service >/dev/null; then service nginx status 2>/dev/null | grep -q running && echo active || echo skip; else echo skip; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl restart nginx || true; elif command -v service >/dev/null; then service nginx restart || true; fi
